          int indentIncre,
          java.lang.String newLine)
        Initializes an instance.
        Parameters:
        indentIncre - Indentation increment in terms of spaces. Can be zero.
        newLine - Line termination sequence. Can be empty.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if w or newLine is null, indentIncre is negative.
